SqlQuery.Data: SELECT IFNULL(event.cid, 0) as cid, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_src) as char(15)), 0) as ip_src, IFNULL(cast(inet_ntoa(iphdr.ip_dst) as char(15)), 0) as ip_dst, IFNULL(iphdr.ip_proto, 0) as ip_proto, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_sport, 0) as tcp_sport, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_sport, 0) as udp_sport, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_dport, 0) as tcp_dport, IFNULL(udphdr.udp_dport, 0) as udp_dport, event.timestamp as timestamp, IFNULL(tcphdr.tcp_flags, 0) as tcp_flags, data.data_payload as data_payload FROM event LEFT JOIN data ON (data.sid = event.sid AND data.cid = event.cid ) LEFT JOIN iphdr ON (event.sid = iphdr.sid AND event.cid = iphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN tcphdr ON (event.sid = tcphdr.sid AND event.cid = tcphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN udphdr ON (event.sid = udphdr.sid AND event.cid = udphdr.cid) LEFT JOIN signature ON (signature.sig_id = event.signature) LEFT JOIN exclude ON ( ((exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src AND exclude.port_src = tcphdr.tcp_sport) OR (exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst AND exclude.port_dst = tcphdr.tcp_dport) OR (exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src AND exclude.port_src = udphdr.udp_sport) OR (exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst AND exclude.port_dst = udphdr.udp_dport)) OR (exclude.ip_dst = 0 OR exclude.ip_dst = iphdr.ip_dst) AND (exclude.ip_src = 0 OR exclude.ip_src = iphdr.ip_src) AND (exclude.port_src = 0 OR (exclude.port_src = tcphdr.tcp_sport OR exclude.port_src = udphdr.udp_sport)) AND (exclude.port_dst = 0 OR (exclude.port_dst = tcphdr.tcp_dport OR exclude.port_dst = udphdr.udp_dport)) AND (exclude.sig_id = 0 OR exclude.sig_id = event.signature) AND (exclude.ip_proto = iphdr.ip_proto) ) #WHERE#
